titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to increase the existing dollar limitation on the total amount of the Federal payments which may be made to Puerto Rico in any fiscal year under the medicaid program.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

bill.summary: 3/9/1987--Introduced. Amends part A (General Provisions) of title XI of the Social Security Act to increase the total amount of Federal payments which may be made to Puerto Rico under title XIX (Medicaid) of the Act.
